"""
Test to reproduce the caplog fixture issue where log level is not restored after test.
"""

def test_foo(caplog):
    """First test that sets caplog level to 42"""
    caplog.set_level(42)

def test_bar(caplog):
    """Second test that should see restored level (0), but sees 42 in broken version"""
    print(f"caplog.handler.level = {caplog.handler.level}")
    # This should be 0 (default/restored), but will be 42 if bug exists
